analysis.Summary: Vue SFC that renders an SVG "edit" icon with customizable fill color and CSS classes.
analysis.Purpose: Provides a reusable edit/navigation icon component that can be used throughout the UI to indicate editing actions or navigation links.

Components.name: IconEdit
Components.role: Root component representing the edit icon. Accepts props to customize its SVG appearance.

Functions.name: defineProps
Functions.purpose: Defines component props in the script setup block.

parameters.fill: String (default: 'rgb(var(--black))') - color value applied to the SVG fill attribute
parameters.classes: String (default: '') - additional CSS class names applied to the <path> element

analysis.Usage: Import and register (or auto‚Äêregister) the component, then use in templates as <IconEdit fill="#ff0000" classes="my-icon-class"/>.
Notes: No <style> block: styling is fully driven by passed classes and CSS variables.
Uses CSS custom property --black for default fill color.
SVG viewBox is 0 0 652 652, scaling controlled via width/height attributes.
Component is a pure presentational/functional icon with no reactive logic beyond props.
